revision.text:
These CCMDs used to exist in the engine, but have been removed. They no longer have any effect.
==CD Drive control== * '''{{LE|cd_close}}''' :Closes the CD tray. * '''{{LE|cd_eject}}''' :Ejects the CD tray. * '''{{LE|cd_pause}}''' :Pauses CD playback. * '''{{LE|cd_play}}''' [track] :Starts playing a CD. If you specify a ''track'', that specific track will be looped. Otherwise, the entire CD will play. * '''{{LE|cd_resume}}''' :Resumes CD playback that was previously paused. * '''{{LE|cd_stop}}''' :Stops CD playback.
[[Category:Documentation for removed features]]
